Articles.Content: Its almost as if this mod is taboo here on these forums. KSP gets four new awesome planets and no ones talking about this? Theres a few articles on reddit, but I cant stand navigating that site. So wheres the discussion? Are there any plans for the mod to be updated? Im surprised there isn't a 100 page thread next to KMP.

It is, Krag hasn't released Planet Factory in a way conforming to this forum's rules, so discussion of it is very controlled, and every thread has turned into a festival of unfriendly nonsense. Suffice to say all those were locked shortly after they were started. Until Krag meets the requirements of this forum, you're probably not going to see much about it here.
Is there any download for it though? ANYWHERE?

So wheres the major discussion on Reddit? The download page has like 10 comments. I just don't understand that site at all. It's safe to say I don't have a high opinion of Reddit, but some information is better then none.
In what way did he not conform to forum rules?

Well I guess you'll just have to deal with reddit. Krag knew the rules, she didn't follow them, and this is the result. All she had to do was release the source code, but instead decided to break the rules for selfish reasons and "internet fame".

"internet fame"

Which as we know is about as valuable as post count and comment karma, yeah, (s)he knew what was required to have that addon here, too bad, look for it and chat surrounding it on another site.

When (s)he decides to post source and a license that addon can be here.

Closing this one.
